name: Envoy App
overview:
Envoy is a simple and fast bug tracker and workflow manager.

Features include:

Case Management: Manage all support in one single location. Add, edit, assign, resolve and track progress on cases.

Time Tracking: Turn support time into billable hours by tracking the time spent fixing issues and replying to customer emails.

Sensible Limits: Costs are based only on how many tickets are needed. Envoy includes unlimited users and unlimited clients as standard.

Wiki: Manage team documentation, customer details, track sales leads and collaborate with others.

Restricted Client Access: Allow clients access to just their tickets, so they can add new items and update issues.

API: Integrate Envoy with other applications (including invoicing, CRM and version control).
